root.name: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games
root.description: OverviewThe cast of characters are lining up for the event.Mario Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games is the third game in the Mario Sonic series. It will take place in London, home of the 2012 Summer Olympics. All 20 playable participants from Mario Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games will make a return in more than fifty all new events. The game is set to release for the Wii in November, and for the 3DS in February 2012. The game will feature new Dream Events and returning favorites from Mario Sonic at the Olympic Games.Events100m DashSoccerLong JumpDream Long JumpTrampolineDream TrampolineDream SpacewalkDream DiscusJavelin ThrowDownload VersionBlock Size: 4,096 blocks (512 MB)
